      • withCheckType

        public CheckOptionsBuilder withCheckType​(CheckType checkType)
        Optional. Default setting is 'interactive'.

        How to choose a correct Check Type? Following are different use cases of the check with corresponding check type:

        Check Type Ux Use case
        interactive Interactive User checks her own document.
        batch Interactive User checks set of her own documents.
        baseline Noninteractive A repository of documents are checked as part of build job running nightly and the user doesn't own the documents.
        automated Noninteractive Check of a single document for automated scenarios as for example a git hook or save a document.
        Parameters:
        checkType - Based on the origin of check
        Returns:
        CheckOptionsBuilder

      • withContentFormat

        public CheckOptionsBuilder withContentFormat​(java.lang.String contentFormat)
        Optional. Per default this is set to "AUTO" which enables the Acrolinx Platforms default mapping for input types to common file extensions.
        Parameters:
        contentFormat -
        Returns:
        CheckOptionsBuilder
        See Also:
        Check Coding Guidance on Github for more information
